00115 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00116 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DeleteInitialGrid()
00117 {
00118   try
00119   {
00120     // Delete the initial nodes
00121     for(int nodeIndex=0; nodeIndex<this->GetNumberNodes(); nodeIndex++)
00122     {
00123       NTYPE *node = this->GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00124 
00125       if(node->IsProtected())
00126       {
00127         int nodeID = node->GetNumberID();
00128 
00129         // Delete all elements that contain this node
00130         while(node->GetNumberElements()>0)
00131         {
00132           int elementID = node->GetElementID(0);
00133 
00134           // Identify all neighbour elements as boundary cells
00135           int    elementIndex = this->GetElementIndex(elementID);
00136           ETYPE *element      = this->GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00137 
00138           for(int neighbourIndex=0; neighbourIndex<element->GetNumberFaces(); neighbourIndex++)
00139           {
00140             int neighbourID = element->GetNeighbourID(neighbourIndex);
00141             if(neighbourID!=-1)
00142             {
00143               int    neighbourEntry = this->GetElementIndex(neighbourID);
00144               ETYPE *neighbour      = this->GetElementPointer(neighbourEntry);
00145 
00146               neighbour->SetBoundary();
00147             }
00148           }
00149 
00150           this->DeleteElement(elementID);
00151         }
00152 
00153         this->DeleteNode(nodeID);
00154       }
00155     }
00156   }
00157 
00158   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00159   {
00160     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::DeleteInitialGrid");
00161     throw EX;
00162   }
00163 }

00165 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00166 int tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::FindEnclosingElement(const NTYPE *node)
00167 {
00168   //
00169   // IN : pointer to new node
00170   // OUT: elementID = ID of the element enclosing the new node
00171   //
00172 
00173   int    elementID = -1;
00174   int    elementIndex;
00175   ETYPE *element;
00176 
00177   try
00178   {
00179     //Start with last element
00180     int returnID         = this->GetElementPointer(this->GetNumberElements()-1)->GetNumberID();
00181     int endlessLoopCheck = -1;
00182 
00183     while(elementID != returnID)
00184     {
00185       if(endlessLoopCheck == returnID)
00186       {
00187         // Programme is hanging in an endless loop
00188         char message[MESLEN];
00189         sprintf(message, "Programme hanging in an ENDLESS LOOP\n    1ST ELEMENTID = %d\n    2ND ELEMENTID = %d", endlessLoopCheck, elementID);
00190         throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00191       }
00192 
00193       endlessLoopCheck = elementID;
00194       elementID        = returnID;
00195       elementIndex     = this->GetElementIndex(elementID);
00196       element          = this->GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00197 
00198       if(element->IsHalo())
00199       {
00200         // Current element is a halo cell, search for neighbour
00201         int f=0;
00202         while(f<element->GetNumberFaces() && element->GetNeighbourID(f)==-1)
00203         {
00204           f++;
00205         }
00206 
00207         if(f>=element->GetNumberFaces())
00208         {
00209           char message[MESLEN];
00210           sprintf(message, "Could not find valid neighbour for halo cell.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", element->GetNumberID());
00211           throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00212         }
00213 
00214         // Return ID of one of the neighbouring tetrahedrons
00215         returnID = element->GetNeighbourID(f);
00216       }
00217       else
00218       {
00219         // Check if node is in current element
00220         returnID = element->IsNodeInElement(node);
00221       }
00222     }
00223 
00224     if(element->IsHalo())
00225     {
00226       char string[25];
00227       sprintf(string, "Found element is HaloCell\n ID = %d", elementID);
00228       throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindEnclosingElement", string);
00229     }
00230   }
00231 
00232   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00233   {
00234     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::FindEnclosingElement");
00235     throw EX;
00236   }
00237 
00238   return(elementID);
00239 }

00241 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00242 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::FindAffectedElements_Simple(const int theElementID, tpList<int> *deleteList, tpList<int> *neighbourList, tpList<int> *neighbourFaceList)
00243 {
00244   //
00245   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00246   //  OUT: deleteList        = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00247   //       neighbourList     = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00248   //       neighbourFaceList = list containing the entries of the affected neighbour faces.
00249   //
00250 
00251   try
00252   {
00253     // Retrieve the element
00254     int    theElementIndex = this->GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00255     ETYPE *theElement      = this->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00256 
00257     // Add element to deleteList
00258     deleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00259 
00260     // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking
00261     for(int f=0; f<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00262     {
00263       int    theNeighbourID    = theElement->GetNeighbourID(f);
00264       int    theNeighbourIndex = this->GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00265       ETYPE* theNeighbour      = this->GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00266 
00267       neighbourList->AddItem(theNeighbourID);
00268 
00269       for(int ff=0; ff<theNeighbour->GetNumberFaces(); ff++)
00270       {
00271         if(theNeighbour->GetNeighbourID(ff)==theElementID)
00272         {
00273           neighbourFaceList->AddItem(ff);
00274         }
00275       }
00276     }
00277 
00278   }
00279 
00280   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00281   {
00282     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::FindAffectedElements_Simple");
00283     throw EX;
00284   }
00285 }
00286 
00287 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00288 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::FindAffectedElements_Advanced(const int theElementID, const NTYPE *theNode, tpList<int> *theDeleteList, tpList<int> *theNeighbourList, tpList<int> *theFaceList)
00289 {
00290   //
00291   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00292   //       theNode           = pointer to the new node; for checking the In-Sphere Criterion
00293   //  OUT: theDeleteList     = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00294   //       theNeighbourList  = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00295   //       theFaceList       = list containg the indices of the affected neighbour faces (in neighbour system).
00296   //
00297 
00298   try
00299   {
00300     tpStack<int> searchStack;
00301     tpStack<int> faceStack;
00302 
00303     faceStack.Push(0);
00304     searchStack.Push(theElementID);
00305     while(!searchStack.IsEmpty())
00306     {
00307       // Pop from stack until stack is empty
00308       int theFaceIndex = faceStack.Pop();
00309       int theElementID = searchStack.Pop();
00310 
00311       // Create pointer to the popped element
00312       int    theElementIndex = this->GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00313       ETYPE *theElement      = this->GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00314 
00315       // Check if the node falls within the circum-sphere of the element
00316       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->InSphereCriterion(theNode))
00317       {
00318         // Check if element was already added to deleteList
00319         int i = theDeleteList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00320         if(i<0)
00321         {
00322           // Not yet added to deleteList; add element to deleteList
00323           theDeleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00324 
00325           // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking for In-Sphere criterion
00326           for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); n++)
00327           {
00328             int theNeighbourID = theElement->GetNeighbourID(n);
00329             if(theNeighbourID!=-1)
00330             {
00331               int    theNeighbourIndex = this->GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00332               ETYPE *theNeighbour      = this->GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00333 
00334               searchStack.Push(theNeighbourID);
00335               faceStack.Push(theNeighbour->FindFaceIndex(theElementID));
00336             }
00337           }
00338         }
00339       }
00340       else
00341       {
00342         // This is an unaffected element (either haloCell or node does not fulfill inSphereCriterion)
00343         // Check if not already added to lists
00344         int i = theNeighbourList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00345         if((i<0) || ((i>=0)&&(theFaceList->GetItem(i)!=theFaceIndex)))
00346         {
00347           // Add to neighbourList
00348           theNeighbourList->AddItem(theElementID);
00349           theFaceList->AddItem(theFaceIndex);
00350         }
00351         else
00352         {
00353           // Strange, seems two elements fight for the same neighbour and same neighbour face
00354           char message[MESLEN];
00355           sprintf(message, "Duplicate entry in theNeighbourList/theFaceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    FACEENTRY = %d", theElementID, theFaceIndex);
00356           throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00357         }
00358       }
00359     }
00360 
00361     // Perform a check
00362     if(theDeleteList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00363     {
00364       char message[MESLEN];
00365       sprintf(message, "Empty deleteList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00366       throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00367     }
00368 
00369     if(theNeighbourList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00370     {
00371       char message[MESLEN];
00372       sprintf(message, "Empty neighbourList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00373       throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00374     }
00375 
00376     if(theFaceList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00377     {
00378       char message[MESLEN];
00379       sprintf(message, "Empty faceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00380       throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00381     }
00382   }
00383 
00384   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00385   {
00386     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::FindAffectedElements");
00387     throw EX;
00388   }
00389 }
00390 
00391 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00392 int tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::InsertNode(const NTYPE theNode)
00393 {
00394   //
00395   // IN : theNode   = the new node that must be inserted
00396   // OUT: theNodeID = the ID number of the newly inserted node
00397   //
00398 
00399   int theNodeID;
00400 
00401   try
00402   {
00403     tpList<int> theDeleteList;    // ID's of all elements to be deleted
00404     tpList<int> theNeighbourList; // ID's of all new neighbour elements
00405     tpList<int> theFaceList;      // Indices of affected neighbour faces
00406 
00407     // Find the affected elements
00408     int theElementID = FindEnclosingElement(&theNode);
00409     FindAffectedElements_Advanced(theElementID, &theNode, &theDeleteList, &theNeighbourList, &theFaceList);
00410 
00411     // Debug info
00412 //    cout << "Primary suspected element: " << theElementID << endl << endl;
00413 //
00414 //    cout << "Number of elements to be deleted: " << theDeleteList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00415 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00416 //    for(int i=0; i<theDeleteList.GetNumberItems(); i++) cout << theDeleteList(i) << " ";
00417 //    cout << endl << endl;
00418 //
00419 //    cout << "Number of neighbour elements: " << theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00420 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00421 //    for(int j=0; j<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); j++) cout << theNeighbourList(j) << " ";
00422 //    cout << endl << endl;
00423 //
00424 //    cout << "Faces are:" << endl;
00425 //    for(int k=0; k<theFaceList.GetNumberItems(); k++) cout << theFaceList(k) << " ";
00426 //    cout << endl << endl;
00427 
00428     // Delete all indicated elements
00429     while(theDeleteList.GetNumberItems()>0)
00430     {
00431       this->DeleteElement(theDeleteList(0));
00432       theDeleteList.DeleteItem(0);
00433     }
00434 
00435     // Insert the new node
00436     theNodeID = AddNode(theNode);
00437 
00438     // Connect the new elements to the found neighbours
00439     tpList<int> theNewElementIDs;
00440     for(int n=0; n<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); n++)
00441     {
00442       int     theNeighbourID    = theNeighbourList(n);
00443       int     theNeighbourIndex = this->GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00444       ETYPE  *theNeighbour      = this->GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00445 
00446       ETYPE   theElement(this, this->GetNewElementID()); //TODO: Check THIS
00447       int     theNumberFaceNodes = theElement.GetNumberFaceNodes();
00448       int     theNumberFaces     = theElement.GetNumberFaces();
00449 
00450       int theFaceNodes[theNumberFaceNodes];
00451       int theNeighbourFaceIndex = theFaceList(n);
00452       theNeighbour->GetFaceNodes(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theFaceNodes);
00453 
00454       // Nodes can already be resolved, so fill
00455       theElement.SetNodeID(0, theNodeID);             // The first node is set to the new node
00456       for(int fn=1; fn<=theNumberFaceNodes; fn++)     // The remaining nodes on the face opposite of the new node are equal to the nodes of the neighbour face, but in reverse order
00457       {
00458         theElement.SetNodeID(fn, theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[theNumberFaceNodes-fn]));
00459       }
00460 
00461       // Only 1 neighbour element is known, so rest is set to -1
00462       theElement.SetNeighbourID(0, theNeighbourID);
00463       for(int nn=1; nn<theNumberFaces; nn++)
00464       {
00465         theElement.SetNeighbourID(nn, -1);
00466       }
00467 
00468       // Create the new element
00469       int theNewElementID = AddElement(theElement);
00470       theNewElementIDs.AddItem(theNewElementID);
00471 
00472       // Make neighbour refer to the new element
00473       theNeighbour->SetNeighbourID(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theNewElementID);
00474 
00475       // Debug info
00476 //      cout << "Connecting " << theNewElementID << ".0 to element " << theNeighbourID << "." << theNeighbourFaceIndex << endl;
00477     }
00478 
00479     // Connect the new elements to each other
00480     ConnectNewElements(&theNewElementIDs);
00481   }
00482 
00483   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00484   {
00485     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::InsertNode");
00486     throw EX;
00487   }
00488 
00489   return(theNodeID);
00490 }
00491 
00492 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00493 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::ConnectNewElements(tpList<int> *newElementIDs)
00494 {
00495   //
00496   // IN : newElementIDs = pointer to list containing all newly created element
00497   // OUT: -
00498   //
00499 
00500   try
00501   {
00502     while(newElementIDs->GetNumberItems()!=0)
00503     {
00504       int    activeID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(0);
00505       int    activeIndex   = this->GetElementIndex(activeID);
00506       ETYPE* activeElement = this->GetElementPointer(activeIndex);
00507 
00508       // Clear from being haloCell
00509       activeElement->ResetHalo();
00510 
00511       // Check the number of already connected faces
00512 //      cout << endl;
00513 
00514       int numberConnected = 0;
00515       for(int f=0; f<activeElement->GetNumberFaces() ; f++)
00516       {
00517         if(activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f)!=-1)
00518         {
00519 //          cout << activeID << "." << f << " connected to " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f) << "     \t[EXISTING CONNECTION]" << endl;
00520           numberConnected++;
00521         }
00522       }
00523 
00524       // Delete element from list; not required anymore
00525       newElementIDs->DeleteItem(0);
00526 
00527       // Loop through remaining list to find neighbour
00528       int  i      = 0;
00529       bool succes = false;
00530       while(i<newElementIDs->GetNumberItems() && numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00531       {
00532         int    passiveID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(i);
00533         int    passiveIndex   = this->GetElementIndex(passiveID);
00534         ETYPE *passiveElement = this->GetElementPointer(passiveIndex);
00535 
00536         // Find neighbour face connnection
00537         int activeFace  = 0;
00538         int passiveFace = 0;
00539         succes = FindFaceConnection(activeID, passiveID, activeFace, passiveFace);
00540 
00541         if(succes && activeElement->GetNeighbourID(activeFace)==-1)
00542         {
00543           // Establish the connection
00544           activeElement->SetNeighbourID(activeFace, passiveID);
00545           passiveElement->SetNeighbourID(passiveFace, activeID);
00546 
00547           // Debug info
00548 //          cout << activeID << "." << activeFace << " connected to " << passiveID << "." << passiveFace << "     \t[NEW CONNECTION]" << endl;
00549 
00550           numberConnected++;
00551         }
00552 
00553         i++;
00554       }
00555 
00556       if(numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00557       {
00558         char message[MESLEN];
00559 //        for(int i=0; i<activeElement->GetNumberFaces(); i++) cout << "FACE " << i<< " CONNECTED TO " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(i) << endl;
00560         sprintf(message, "Could not establish a connection.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", activeID);
00561         throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "ConnectNewElements", message);
00562       }
00563     }
00564   }
00565 
00566   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00567   {
00568     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::ConnectNewElements");
00569     throw EX;
00570   }
00571 }
00572 
00573 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00574 bool tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::FindFaceConnection(const int masterID, const int slaveID, int &masterFaceIndex, int &slaveFaceIndex)
00575 {
00576   //
00577   // IN : masterID   = ID of master element
00578   //      slaveID    = ID of slave element
00579   // OUT: masterFace = face entry of master element referring to slave element
00580   //      slaveFace  = face entry of slave element referring to master element
00581   // OUT: ret        = TRUE if a connection was found
00582   //                   FALSE if no connection was found
00583   //
00584 
00585   bool ret = false;
00586 
00587   try
00588   {
00589     // Find the element entries
00590     int masterIndex = this->GetElementIndex(masterID);
00591     int slaveIndex  = this->GetElementIndex(slaveID);
00592 
00593     // Retrieve the elements
00594     ETYPE *masterElement = this->GetElementPointer(masterIndex);
00595     ETYPE *slaveElement  = this->GetElementPointer(slaveIndex);
00596 
00597     // Check on number of face nodes
00598     if(slaveFaceIndex>=slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() || masterFaceIndex>=masterElement->GetNumberFaces())
00599     {
00600       char message[MESLEN];
00601       sprintf(message, "Invalid face(s) found.\n    MASTERFACE = %d\n    SLAVEFACE  = %d", masterFaceIndex, slaveFaceIndex);
00602       throw clException("tpUnstructured", "FindFaceConnection", message);
00603     }
00604 
00605     // Loop through all faces of the master element
00606     masterFaceIndex=0;
00607     while(masterFaceIndex<masterElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00608     {
00609       // Loop through all faces of the slave element
00610       slaveFaceIndex=0;
00611       while(slaveFaceIndex<slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00612       {
00613         // Check if the master face is equal to the slave face
00614         if(IsEqualFace(masterElement, masterFaceIndex, slaveElement, slaveFaceIndex))
00615         {
00616           ret=true;
00617         }
00618 
00619         slaveFaceIndex++;
00620       }
00621 
00622       masterFaceIndex++;
00623     }
00624     slaveFaceIndex--;
00625     masterFaceIndex--;
00626   }
00627 
00628   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00629   {
00630     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::FindFaceConnection");
00631     throw EX;
00632   }
00633 
00634   return(ret);
00635 }
00636 
00637 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00638 bool tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::IsEqualFace(ETYPE *masterElement, const int masterFaceIndex, ETYPE *slaveElement, const int slaveFaceIndex)
00639 {
00640   //
00641   // IN : masterNodeIDs = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the master face
00642   //      slaveNodeIDs  = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the slave face
00643   // OUT: ret = TRUE if current master face is equal to slave face
00644   //            FALSE if current master face is not equal to slave face
00645   //
00646 
00647   bool ret = false;
00648 
00649   try
00650   {
00651     int numberConnectedNodes = 0;
00652     int numberFaceNodes      = masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes();
00653 
00654     int masterNodeIDs[numberFaceNodes];
00655     int slaveNodeIDs[numberFaceNodes];
00656     masterElement->GetFaceNodes(masterFaceIndex, masterNodeIDs);
00657     slaveElement->GetFaceNodes(slaveFaceIndex, slaveNodeIDs);
00658 
00659     for(int i=0; i<numberFaceNodes; i++)
00660     {
00661       for(int j=0; j<numberFaceNodes; j++)
00662       {
00663         if(masterNodeIDs[i]==slaveNodeIDs[j]) numberConnectedNodes++;
00664       }
00665     }
00666 
00667     if(numberConnectedNodes==numberFaceNodes) ret=true;
00668   }
00669 
00670   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00671   {
00672     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::IsEqualFace");
00673     throw EX;
00674   }
00675 
00676   return(ret);
00677 }
00678 
00679 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00680 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CorrectGrid(void)
00681 {
00682   try
00683   {
00684     CorrectInSphereCriterion();
00685   }
00686 
00687   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00688   {
00689     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::CorrectGrid");
00690     throw EX;
00691   }
00692 }
00693 
00694 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00695 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CorrectInSphereCriterion(void)
00696 {
00697   try
00698   {
00699     int e = 0;
00700     while(e<this->GetNumberElements())
00701     {
00702       ETYPE* element = this->GetElementPointer(e);
00703 
00704       // Loop through all nodes
00705       for(int n=0; n<this->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00706       {
00707         NTYPE* node = this->GetNodePointer(n);
00708 
00709         cout << "Checking node " << node->GetNumberID() << " against element " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00710 
00711         bool repairElement = true;
00712         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsHalo();
00713         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsElementNode(node->GetNumberID());
00714         repairElement = repairElement &&  element->InSphereCriterion(node);
00715 
00716         if(repairElement)
00717         {
00718           NTYPE    centroid  = element->GetCentroid();
00719           NTYPE   *lastNode  = this->GetNodePointer(this->GetNumberNodes()-1);
00720           int      newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00721 
00722           NTYPE    newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
00723           newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
00724 
00725           // Debugging
00726           cout << "Corrected element: " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00727 
00728           // Restart at beginning
00729           e = -1;
00730           n = this->GetNumberNodes();
00731         }
00732       }
00733 
00734       e++;
00735     }
00736   }
00737 
00738   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00739   {
00740     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::CorrectInSphereCriterion");
00741     throw EX;
00742   }
00743 }
00744 
00745 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00746 bool tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckGrid(void)
00747 {
00748   bool ret=true;
00749 
00750   try
00751   {
00752     // Check initial grid
00753     ret = ret && this->CheckElementConnections();
00754     ret = ret && this->CheckNodeConnections();
00755     ret = ret && this->CheckElementParentGrid();
00756     ret = ret && this->CheckElementVolumes();
00757     ret = ret && this->CheckInSphereCriterion();
00758   }
00759 
00760   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00761   {
00762     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::CheckGrid");
00763     throw EX;
00764   }
00765 
00766   return(ret);
00767 }
00768 
00769 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00770 bool tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckElementVolumes(void)
00771 {
00772   bool ret=true;
00773 
00774   try
00775   {
00776     // Loop through all elements
00777     for(int e=0; e<this->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00778     {
00779       ETYPE* theElement = this->GetElementPointer(e);
00780 
00781       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->GetVolume()<=PRECISION)
00782       {
00783         ret=false;
00784 
00785         char message[MESLEN];
00786         sprintf(message, "Detected element with zero or negative volume.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElement->GetNumberID());
00787         throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "CheckElementVolumes", message);
00788       }
00789     }
00790   }
00791 
00792   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00793   {
00794     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::CheckElementVolumes");
00795     throw EX;
00796   }
00797 
00798   return(ret);
00799 }
00800 
00801 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00802 bool tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckInSphereCriterion(void)
00803 {
00804   bool ret=true;
00805 
00806   try
00807   {
00808     // Loop through all elements
00809     for(int e=0; e<this->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00810     {
00811       ETYPE* element = this->GetElementPointer(e);
00812 
00813       // Loop through all nodes
00814       for(int n=0; n<this->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00815       {
00816         NTYPE* node = this->GetNodePointer(n);
00817 
00818         // Check node is not part of element
00819         int  i     = 0;
00820         bool found = false;
00821         while(i<element->GetNumberNodes() && !found)
00822         {
00823           if(element->GetNodeID(i) == node->GetNumberID())
00824           {
00825             found = true;
00826           }
00827 
00828           i++;
00829         }
00830 
00831         if(!element->IsHalo() && !found && element->InSphereCriterion(node))
00832         {
00833           ret=false;
00834 
00835           char message[MESLEN];
00836           sprintf(message, "Detected node breaching in-sphere criterion.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    NODEID      = %d", element->GetNumberID(), node->GetNumberID());
00837           throw clExceptionTree("tpUnstructured", "CheckInSphereCriterion", message);
00838         }
00839       }
00840     }
00841   }
00842 
00843   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00844   {
00845     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::CheckInSphereCriterion");
00846     throw EX;
00847   }
00848 
00849   return(ret);
00850 }
00851 
00852 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00853 void tpUnstructured<NTYPE, ETYPE>::RandomCentroidInsertion(const int numberInsertions)
00854 {
00855   try
00856   {
00857     srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
00858     //srand((unsigned)0);
00859 
00860     for(int i=0; i<numberInsertions; i++)
00861     {
00862       // Select a random tetrahedron - but not a halo tetrahedron
00863       int index = rand() % this->GetNumberElements();
00864 
00865       ETYPE *theElement = this->GetElementPointer(index);
00866       if(!theElement->IsHalo())
00867       {
00868         NTYPE  centroid  = theElement->GetCentroid();
00869         NTYPE *lastNode  = this->GetNodePointer(this->GetNumberNodes()-1);
00870         int    newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00871 
00872         NTYPE  newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
00873         newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
00874       }
00875       else
00876       {
00877         // Retry randomisation
00878         i--;
00879       }
00880     }
00881   }
00882 
00883   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00884   {
00885     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpUnstructured::RandomCentroidInsertion3D");
00886     throw EX;
00887   }
00888 }
